title: Sales of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This is a bar chart representing Streaming Brand in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 8.8 is found at Streaming Brand Apple TV and the minimum is found at Tivo where Streaming Brand is 1.2.
Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.33 times more Unit sales in millions than Streaming Brand Tivo which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Streaming Brand in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Streaming Brand in the x axis and Unit sales in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 8.8 is found at Streaming Brand Apple TV and the minimum is found at Tivo where Streaming Brand is 1.2.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 6 number of Streaming Brands.
The Unit sales in millions is highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
The highest Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.6 more Unit sales in millions than the lowest Streaming Brand Tivo.
The Streaming Brand Apple TV has the highest Unit sales in millions, followed by Fire TV, and Roku. Down to the Streaming Brand Tivo which is the lowest.
The Streaming Brand Apple TV tends to be 1.91 percent higher than average.
